Fast Attacks increase Strong Attack damage for $S$ seconds by $S$% for each piece of the set. Current bonus: $S$%.
Reduces the cooldown of White Wolf's Wrath by $S$ seconds.
Wolf School Crossbow
Supreme Red Mutagen
Supreme Green Mutagen
Supreme Blue Mutagen
Aerondight, The Sword of Destiny
White Wolf's Wrath

If a sign is cast when he has full aderenaline, Geralt will enter a heightened state where he invulnerble, his vitality regenerates at an accelerated pace and all of his abilities deal double damage for 20 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds.

Each blow generates charges which increase sword damage by $S$%. Charges are lost over time or when receiving damage. A fully-charged sword always deals critical hit damage and ignores defenses. Is effective against both humans and monsters.
If Toxicity is above 0, each opponent killed increases critical hit chance, damage, attack power and spell power by $I$% for the duration of that fight, up to a maximum of 5 kills.
Adrenaline Point loss upon taking damage is lowered by $I$% and stagger duration is divided by $I$.
When Adrenaline Points are at their maximum critical hit damage against the targeted enemy type is increased by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases monster damage resistance by $I$%.
When consumed, mutagen decoction increases maximum Vitality by $I$ for decoction's effective duration. Passive Bonus: Increases Slashing, Piercing and Bludgeoning resistance by $I$%.
Extends effective duration of all mutagen decoctions by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases poison damage resistance by $I$%.
Each Adrenaline Point adds $I$% to the chance of killing an opponent instantly. Passive Bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$% and increases damage resistance by $I$%.
Increases Igni Sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases burning resistance by $I$%.
Increases Yrden Sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Increases elemental damage resistance by $I$%.
Butcher of Blaviken
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 10.
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 10.
Every known level 1 or 2 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 20.
Every known level 1, 2 or 3 alchemy formula increases maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 30.
Damage from hits received while dodging is reduced by $I$%. Passive bonus:Increases bleeding resistance by $I$%.

Instantly gain one Adrenaline Point when entering combat. The Adrenaline Points generated by sword blows are increased by $I$%. Each adrenaline point now also adds $I$% critical damage bonus. Passive Bonus: All sword attacks deal $I$ bleeding damage.
Violence
Increases attack power by $I$% and critical hit damage by $I$% for all sword attacks. Passive bonus: adds $I$% damage reduction against all attacks.
Increases strong critical hit chance by $I$% and strong attack critical hit damage by $I$%. Strong attacks now crush enemy armor and reduce their damage resistance by $I$%.
Increases the chance to apply Burning by $I$%. Passive Bonus:Adds $I$ fire damage to all attacks (increases with character level).
Increases the damage dealt by Aard to $I$. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$ force damage to all attacks (increases with character level).
Increases potion overdose threshold by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Reduces potiion toxicity by $I$%.
Control Over The Power
Increases damage resistance by $I$% to all attacks. Also increases sign intensity by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Adds $I$ shock damage to all attacks.
Increases damage resistance, spell power and provides a passive shock damage bonus to all attacks.

Increases Sign duration by $I$ seconds. Number of alternate mode charges: $I$. Number of Standard mode traps: $I$. Enemies under the influence of Yrden lose $I$ point(s) of Vitality or Essence per second. Receives additional damage from $I$ of spell power.
The 5th Element
Strong attack damage increased by $I$%. Passive Bonus: Bludgeoning damage resistance increased by $I$%.
Provides $I$% damage reduction against all damage types. Also increases spell power by $I$% and attack power by $I$%. Passive bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$%.
Raw Power
Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks with a chance for knock-down. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Each bolt that hits its target adds $F$ Adrenaline Points. Passive bonus: Increases critical hit damage by $I$%.
Battle Trance now increases critical hit chance by $I$%, an additional $I$% critical hit damage and $I$% attack power per Adrenaline Point
